info.name: IMPS API Collection v2.1
info.description:
Complete IMPS API Collection for NPCI and Switch endpoints. All request/response bodies use the NPCI message format defined in project root: NPCI_IMPS_Message_Formats.md (ReqPay 6.1, RespPay 6.2, ReqChkTxn 7.1, RespChkTxn).

- Pay (Fund Transfer), ChkTxn (Check Transaction Status), Heartbeat, ListAccPvd, ValAdd
- NPCI Endpoints: XML (application/xml). Switch: application/xml or application/octet-stream (ISO).
- Ports: IMPS Backend 8081, Mock Switch 8082, NPCI Mock 8083.

Test data (imps_full_schema.sql account_master):
- Rugved Kharde 1234567890123456 @ HDFC0000001, Chetan Mokashi 9876543210987654 @ HDFC0000001
- Sajid Mulla 1111222233334444 @ ICIC0000001, Madhav Shipure 5555666677778888 @ SBIN0000001
- Use these for API testing; Mock Switch debit/credit on success (00).

Database: imps_db.

RespPay Failure Response.

Common Error Codes:
- U30: Beneficiary bank not available
- U31: Invalid beneficiary IFSC
- U14: Invalid/Incorrect payee MMID
- U12: Invalid/Incorrect payee account number

item.description:
Mock Switch (port 8082) - Accepts XML and ISO.

Use account_master seed accounts for ReqPay so Mock Switch debit/credit succeeds (00):
Payer 1234567890123456@HDFC0000001 or 9876543210987654@HDFC0000001, Payee 1111222233334444@ICIC0000001 or 5555666677778888@SBIN0000001.

Request Endpoints: /switch/reqpay/2.1, reqchktxn/2.1, reqhbt/2.1, reqvaladd/2.1, reqlistaccpvd/2.1

item.name: Reference - Response Codes
item.description: Common IMPS/NPCI Response Codes for reference

request.description:
**RESPONSE CODES REFERENCE (This is not an actual API)**

**Success Codes:**
- 00 - Transaction Successful

**Failure Codes:**
- U12 - Invalid/Incorrect payee account number
- U14 - Invalid/Incorrect payee MMID
- U30 - Beneficiary bank not available
- U31 - Invalid beneficiary IFSC
- U48 - Transaction not permitted to card holder
- U51 - Insufficient funds
- U66 - Device fingerprint mismatch
- U68 - Credentials not present
- U78 - Transaction Declined
- 91 - Issuer unavailable
- 12 - Invalid transaction
- 51 - Insufficient funds
- 96 - System malfunction

**Account Types (ACTYPE):**
- SAVINGS
- CURRENT
- DEFAULT
- NRE
- NRO
- CREDIT
- PPIWALLET
- BANKWALLET
- SOD
- UOD
- SEMICLOSEDPPIWALLET
- SEMICLOSEDBANKWALLET
- SNRR

**Transaction Types:**
- PAY - Debit from Payer
- CREDIT - Credit to Payee
- VR - Verification Request (ChkTxn)
- NameEnq - Name Enquiry
- ValAdd - Address Validation
- Hbt - Heartbeat
- ListAccPvd - List Account Providers

**Initiation Modes:**
- 00 - Default (Mobile)
- 12 - FIR (Foreign Inward Remittance)

**Device Types:**
- MOB - Mobile
- WAP - WAP
- IVR - IVR
- ATM - ATM
- BRC - Branch
- MAT - Mobile Assisted Transaction
- SMS - SMS

**Institution Routes (for FIR):**
- MTSS - Money Transfer Service Scheme
- RDA - Rupee Drawing Arrangement

**RefCategory Values:**
- 00 - NULL
- 01 - Advertisement
- 02 - Invoice
- 03-09 - Reserved
